name: Spinotech
overview:
Spinotech is a e-marketing, e-business, and e-watch agency dedicated to the world of Biosciences.(Biotech, Pharma, Healthcare, Medtech, Agrotech, Cosmetics, Cleantech)

At Spinotech we have developed innovative products and services to dramatically increase your visibility on the web of your niche which will at the same time improve your Search Engine Optimization(SEO), credibility and e-reputation. Our unique Web analysis and strategic tactics will also enable you to track your competitors, target the (most) appropriate audience with intensive communication(flood), learn about the market trends and much more.

Our team of experts combining both Biotech background and high level digital marketing and IT skills, will be dedicated to resolving any of your e-marketing related issues. With the World Wide Web being a fast paced environment, we have chosen to focus our attention on digital innovation to take our customers where they want to go.

Because we are committed to making an impact on your organization, because we will stay by your side on the way leading to your success, because your satisfaction is our priority, chose Spinotech as a partner.
